meanings.sent1: After resting, the bird reflew into the sky.
meanings.sent2: The butterfly reflew from one flower to another.
meanings.sent3: The superhero reflew to the rescue after a quick break.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams reflew to the possibilities of the future.
meanings.sent5: The kite reflew gracefully in the breeze.

meanings.sent1: Realizing the mistake, the bird reflew to its nest.
meanings.sent2: The homing pigeon reflew to its home loft.
meanings.sent3: The lost balloon reflew to the child's hand with a gentle tug.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts reflew to the memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The boomerang reflew back to its thrower.

meanings.sent1: Confused by the wind, the paper airplane reflew sideways.
meanings.sent2: The bird reflew around the obstacle in its path.
meanings.sent3: The kite reflew in a zigzag pattern, surprising the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her words reflew in a new direction, changing the course of the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The dragonfly reflew in a loop, showing off its agility.
